actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt retired public safety officers from the early withdrawal tax on pension distributions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the ten percent penalty tax on early distributions any distribution received on or after retirement by qualified public safety officers (law enforcement or corrections officers, firefighters, or emergency service personnel) under a deferred compensation plan maintained by a Federal or other governmental entity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt retired public safety officers from the early withdrawal tax on pension distributions.
